product_name: SOLE Chris Davenport Signature CD Thin Custom Footbeds - Low Volume
long_description: SOLE Chris Davenport Signature CD Thin custom footbeds have a low-profile, lightly insulated design that's optimized to fit in tight-fitting ski and snowboard boots for wintertime support and comfort. Heat-moldable design ensures personal fit and ample support to reduce stress and foot fatigue. Wicking, perforated polyester topsheets manage moisture and balance friction control with comfort; contains 38% recycled content. 400g layer of Thinsulate(TM) insulation offers enhanced warmth underfoot, keeping toes toasty. Deep heel cup and customized arch support help maintain stability and proper knee-to-ankle alignment to reduce fatigue and pain. Custom fit helps eliminate pressure points by supporting the arch and distributing weight evenly to increase blood flow and reduce numbness. Can be worn with or without heat-molding to achieve a custom shape and the proper amount of support. Heat-moldable EVA foam base supplies lightweight cushioning and a custom shape; contains 20% recycled content. It's very easy to mold the footbeds: simply warm footbeds in a 200degF oven for about 2 minutes, then remove and place inside footwear. Opti-Therm Molding indicator makes custom fitting a snap-indicator turns black when insoles are ready to be removed from oven. To finish the process, step into the footwear and stand straight with feet shoulder width apart for 2 min. $1.00 from the sale of each pair of SOLE Chris Davenport Signature CD Thin Custom footbeds is donated to Protect Our Winters. Protect Our Winters is an organization working toward the goal of reducing climate change's effects on winter sports and local economies.
short_description: SOLE Chris Davenport Signature CD Thin custom footbeds have a low-profile, lightly insulated design that's optimized to fit in tight-fitting ski and snowboard boots for wintertime support and comfort.
